text: Las Cruces is the second largest city in the American state of New Mexico. The current population is about 110,000. The city is known for its large Urban Renewal Project that tore down much of its historic Main Street area. The main campus of New Mexico State University is in Las Cruces. ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Las Cruces "People Helping People" Category:Cities in New Mexico Category:County seats in New Mexico Category:1840s establishments in North America
title: Las Cruces, New Mexico
